column1: guestbook-form-header-message { padding:15px; border:1px solid rgb(209, 197, 158); border-bottom:none; background-color:rgb(232, 230, 207); } . guestbook-form-body { background-color:rgb(232, 230, 207); } . guestbook-form-footer-message { padding-top:15px; padding-right:15px; padding-left:15px; border:1px solid rgb(209, 197, 158); border-top:none; background-color:rgb(232, 230, 207); } label. valid { width: 24px; height: 24px; background: url(assets/img/valid. png) center center no-repeat; display: inline-block; text-indent: -9999px; } label. error { font-weight: bold; color: red; padding: 2px 8px; margin-top: 2px; } $(document). ready(function(){ $('#gb-entry-form'). validate( { rules: { trib_name: { required: true }, trib_email: { required: true, email: true }, trib_tribute: { /* required: true */ maxwords: 250 }, trib_captcha: { required: true } }, highlight: function(element) { $(element). closest('. form-group'). addclass('has-error'); }, unhighlight: function(element) { $(element). closest('. form-group'). removeclass('has-error'); }, errorelement: 'span', errorclass: 'help-block', errorplacement: function(error, element) { if(element. parent('. input-group'). length) { error. insertafter(element. parent()); } else { error. insertafter(element); } } }); $. ajaxsetup ({ // disable caching of any ajax responses. cache: false }); $(". captchareloader"). show(); $("#reloadlink"). click(function(e) { e. preventdefault(); $("#captchadiv"). load("/home/api/showcaptcha. cfc? method=getnew. captcha&fh_id=11621"); }); }); // end document. ready
